titleStmt.title: Innocency triumphant over insolency and outrage of a self-condemned apostate in answer to Francis Bugg's most abusive and scandalous book, falsely stiled, New Rome arraigned &c., and in defence of the Christian testimony of G. Whitehead and eleven witnesses against the great defamation of perjury and pillory, unjustly cast upon them by the said F.B.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
